panels.description: Current status of Kafka cluster

targets.query: SELECT max("status") FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster Status

panels.description: Current size of Kafka cluster

targets.query: SELECT min("size") FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster Size

panels.description: Current state of controller broker. The controller changes state when processing an event. Most of the time, the Idle state is displayed, which means that the controller has processed all the events. If the event processing takes a considerable time (several seconds or more), this state of the controller will be displayed

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WHERE "name" = 'ControllerState' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Controller State

panels.description:
Current controller broker.
The first node to boot in a Kafka cluster automatically becomes the controller, and there can be only one. The controller in a Kafka cluster is responsible for maintaining the list of partition leaders, and coordinating leadership transitions (in the event a partition leader becomes unavailable). If it becomes necessary to replace the controller, a new controller is randomly chosen by ZooKeeper from the pool of brokers. In general, it is not possible for this value to be greater than one, but you should definitely alert on a value of zero

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_ActiveControllerBroker" WHERE "gauge" = 1 AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Controller Broker

panels.description: Kafka version running on controller broker

targets.query: SELECT last("version") FROM "kafka_server_app_info_Version" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Kafka Version

targets.query: SELECT "status" FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster Status Transitions

targets.query: SELECT "gauge" FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WHERE "name" = 'ControllerState' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

panels.title: Controller State Transitions

panels.description: Information about brokers configuration consistency

targets.query: SELECT last("same_configs") FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Similar Configs

panels.description: Information about broker states, number of partitions replicas on each broker, number of partitions where current broker is a leader, skews and number of under replicated partitions

targets.query: SELECT max("broker_state") AS "broker_state", max("partition_count") AS "partition_count", max("broker_skew") AS "broker_skew", max("leader_count") AS "leader_count", max("broker_leader_skew") AS "broker_leader_skew", max("under_replicated_partitions") AS "under_replicated_partitions", max("under_min_isr_partition_count") AS "under_min_isr_partition_count" FROM "kafka" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Brokers

panels.description: Total number of topics on Kafka cluster

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WHERE "name" = 'GlobalTopicCount' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Total Topics Count

panels.description: Total number of partitions on Kafka cluster

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WHERE "name" = 'GlobalPartitionCount' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Total Partitions Count

panels.description: Number of partitions without an active leader. Because all read and write operations are only performed on partition leaders, a non-zero value for this metric should be alerted on to prevent service interruptions. Any partition without an active leader will be completely inaccessible, and both consumers and producers of that partition will be blocked until a leader becomes available

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WHERE "name" = 'OfflinePartitionsCount' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Offline Partitions Count

panels.description: List of topics which have at least one partition without a leader

targets.query: SELECT last("topics_without_leader") AS "TopicsWithoutLeader" FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Topics Without Leader

panels.description: List of topics which have at least one under replicated partition

targets.query: SELECT last("under_replicated_topics") AS "UnderReplicatedTopics" FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Under Replicated Topics

panels.description: Count of unclean leader elections since Kafka start

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_ControllerStats_Value" WHERE "name" = 'UncleanLeaderElectionsPerSec' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Unclean Leader Election Count

panels.description: List of topics with unclean leader election enabled. Unclean leader elections can lead to data loss, so you should check these topics to see if this setting is set reasonably

targets.query: SELECT last("topics_with_unclean_leader_election") AS "TopicsWithUncleanLeaderElection" FROM "kafka_cluster" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Topics With Unclean Leader Election Enabled

panels.description: Number of consumer groups in different states

targets.query: SELECT max("NumGroups") AS "Total", max("NumGroupsStable") AS "Stable", max("NumGroupsPreparingRebalance") AS "PreparingRebalance", max("NumGroupsCompletingRebalance") AS "CompletingRebalance",  max("NumGroupsEmpty") AS "Empty", max("NumGroupsDead") AS "Dead" FROM (SELECT "project_name", "broker", "gauge" AS "NumGroups" FROM "kafka_coordinator_group_GroupMetadataManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'NumGroups'), (SELECT "project_name", "broker", "gauge" AS "NumGroupsStable" FROM "kafka_coordinator_group_GroupMetadataManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'NumGroupsStable'), (SELECT "project_name", "broker", "gauge" AS "NumGroupsPreparingRebalance" FROM "kafka_coordinator_group_GroupMetadataManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'NumGroupsPreparingRebalance'), (SELECT "project_name", "broker", "gauge" AS "NumGroupsCompletingRebalance" FROM "kafka_coordinator_group_GroupMetadataManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'NumGroupsCompletingRebalance'), (SELECT "project_name", "broker", "gauge" AS "NumGroupsEmpty" FROM "kafka_coordinator_group_GroupMetadataManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'NumGroupsEmpty'), (SELECT "project_name", "broker", "gauge" AS "NumGroupsDead" FROM "kafka_coordinator_group_GroupMetadataManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'NumGroupsDead') WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Consumer Groups Number

panels.description: JVM heap usage by broker

targets.query: SELECT max("used") AS "used", max("max") AS "limit" FROM "java_Memory_HeapMemoryUsage" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: JVM Heap Usage

panels.description: JVM heap usage by broker in percent (%)

targets.query: SELECT 100 * max("used") / max("max") FROM "java_Memory_HeapMemoryUsage" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: JVM Heap Usage in Percent

panels.description: Garbage collection time rate per Sampling interval by broker

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "java_GarbageCollector_CollectionTime_total" WHERE "name" = 'G1 Young Generation' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "java_GarbageCollector_CollectionTime_total" WHERE "name" = 'G1 Old Generation' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: GC Time

panels.description: Garbage collections count rate per Sampling interval by broker

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "java_GarbageCollector_CollectionCount_total" WHERE "name" = 'G1 Young Generation' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 AS "old" FROM "java_GarbageCollector_CollectionCount_total" WHERE "name" = 'G1 Old Generation' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: GC Count

panels.description: Memory usage by pod

targets.query: SELECT max(value) FROM "memory/usage" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "pod_name" =~ /$broker.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(linear)

SELECT max(value) FROM "memory/limit" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "pod_name" =~ /$broker.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(linear)

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage by pod

targets.query: SELECT max(value) FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "pod_name" =~ /$broker.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(linear)

SELECT max(value) FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "pod_name" =~ /$broker.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(linear)

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The data usage size in percent for a Kafka broker

targets.query: SELECT max("used_percent") FROM "t_disk" WHERE "path" =~ /.*$side.*$/ AND "path" =~ /.*$broker$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk Usage in Percent

panels.description: The data usage size in bytes for a Kafka broker

targets.query: SELECT max("used") AS "used", max("total") AS "limit" FROM "t_disk" WHERE "path" =~ /.*$side.*$/ AND "path" =~ /.*$broker$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description: Total number of controller requests to be sent out to brokers

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_ControllerChannelManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'TotalQueueSize' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Total Queue Size

panels.description: Size of ControllerEventManager's queue. Every ControllerEvent has an associated state. When a ControllerEvent is processed, it triggers a state transition to the requested state. ControllerEvent events are managed by ControllerEventManager

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_controller_ControllerEventManager_Value" WHERE "name" = 'EventQueueSize' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Event Queue Size

panels.description: Time it takes for any event (except the Idle event) to wait in the ControllerEventManager's queue before being processed

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_controller_ControllerEventManager_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'EventQueueTimeMs' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Event Queue Time Rate

panels.description: Aggregate incoming/outgoing byte rate per Sampling interval

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'BytesInPerSec' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'BytesOutPerSec' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Bytes In/Out

panels.description: Amount of data in bytes per Sampling interval rejected by broker

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'BytesRejectedPerSec' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Bytes Rejected

panels.description: ZooKeeper session state for each broker

targets.query: SELECT last("value") AS "zookeeper_session_state" FROM "kafka_server_SessionExpireListener_Value" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: ZooKeeper Session State

panels.description: Latency of ZooKeeper requests

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_ZooKeeperClientMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'ZooKeeperRequestLatencyMs' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: ZooKeeper Requests Latency

panels.description: ISR expansion rate. If a broker goes down, ISR for some of the partitions will shrink. When that broker is up again, ISR will be expanded once the replicas are fully caught up. Other than that, the expected value for both ISR shrink rate and expansion rate is 0

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_ReplicaManager_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'IsrExpandsPerSec' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Isr Expands Rate

panels.description: ISR shrink rate. If a broker goes down, ISR for some of the partitions will shrink. When that broker is up again, ISR will be expanded once the replicas are fully caught up. Other than that, the expected value for both ISR shrink rate and expansion rate is 0

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_ReplicaManager_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'IsrShrinksPerSec' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Isr Shrinks Rate

panels.description: Aggregate incoming messages rate per Sampling interval

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'MessagesInPerSec' AND "topic" = '' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Message Rate

panels.description: Total fetch request rate per Sampling interval

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'TotalFetchRequestsPerSec' AND "topic" = '' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Total Fetch Requests Rate

panels.description: Total produce request rate per Sampling interval

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'TotalProduceRequestsPerSec' AND "topic" = '' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Total Produce Requests Rate

panels.description: Fetch request rate per Sampling interval for requests that failed

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec' AND "topic" = '' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Failed Fetch Requests Rate

panels.description: Produce request rate per Sampling interval for requests that failed

targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("value"), 60s)/60 FROM "kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count_total" WHERE "name" = 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec' AND "topic" = '' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Failed Produce Requests Rate

panels.description: Size of fetch queue

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_server_Fetch_queue_size" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Fetch Queue Size

panels.description: Size of request queue. A congested request queue will not be able to process incoming or outgoing requests

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "kafka_network_RequestChannel_Value" WHERE "name" = 'RequestQueueSize' AND "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Request Queue Size

panels.description: Number of live threads, including both daemon and non-daemon threads

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "java_Threading_ThreadCount" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Thread Count

panels.description: Total number of threads created and also started since the JVM started

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge") FROM "java_Threading_TotalStartedThreadCount" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Total Started Thread Count

panels.description: Information about configured and dead Log Cleaner and Replica Fetcher threads

targets.query: SELECT max("log_cleaner_threads_count") AS "Log Cleaner Threads Count", max("log_cleaner_dead_threads_count") AS "Log Cleaner Dead Threads Count", max("replica_fetcher_threads_count") AS "Replica Fetcher Threads Count", max("replica_fetcher_dead_threads_count") AS "Replica Fetcher Dead Threads Count" FROM "kafka" WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "broker" =~ /^$side.*/ AND "broker" =~ /$broker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "broker" fill(null)

panels.title: Log Cleaner And Replica Fetcher Threads

list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WITH KEY = "project_name"

list.label: Broker
list.name: broker
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value" WITH KEY = "broker" WHERE "broker"=~/$side.*/
